<<<<<<< HEAD
Test.ForceNoIconv
TYPE: bool
DEFAULT: false
--DESCRIPTION--
When set to true, HTMLPurifier_Encoder will act as if iconv does not exist
and use only pure PHP implementations.
--# vim: et sw=4 sts=4
=======
Test.ForceNoIconv
TYPE: bool
DEFAULT: false
--DESCRIPTION--
When set to true, HTMLPurifier_Encoder will act as if iconv does not exist
and use only pure PHP implementations.
